title: Full Stack Web Developer (JavaScript/PHP) - CMS
description: Bridged the gap between the CMS and experience teams by being the first team member to work on both
highlights: Bridged the gap between the CMS and experience teams by being the first team member to work on both
Successfully contributed to the development of three generations of CMS frameworks, ensuring the platforms' stability and longevity
